thread.title: 90 Day Fiancé Star Angela Deem Unveils Stunning Transformation After Weight Loss Surgery
thread.title_full: 90 Day Fiancé Star Angela Deem Unveils Stunning Transformation After Weight Loss Surgery

author: BNN Correspondents
title: 90 Day Fiancé Star Angela Deem Unveils Stunning Transformation After Weight Loss Surgery
text:
Angela Deem has shown an impressive transformation ahead of her return to 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After?. The Georgia reality star was confident about her looks and body when she debuted on reality TV. However, a few years ago, Angela faced a health scare due to her excessive weight gain. In August 2020, Angela underwent weight loss surgery to achieve a new look to better herself. She also opted for a breast reduction alongside other cosmetic procedures to help enhance her looks.
Angela's Cute TikTok Show's Face Transformation
Angela has proudly showed off her new slim face on social media. In February 2024, she took to Instagram and shared a close-up picture of her from a bar. She smiled in the photo and confidently showcased her pearly white teeth and prominent cheekbones. Angela also showcased her jawline, which appeared sharper than her last TV appearance on 90 Day: The Last Resort season 1. Angela joyfully captioned the post with the hashtag, "IAMQUEENOFME," letting her followers know she thinks of herself as a literal queen.
Angela Is A Filtered Queen
Cast members are often discouraged from using filters because of fan backlash. However, Angela doesn't care about critics and loves to use them to make her slim face look even better. In January 2024, the 90 Day Fiancé franchise star shared a video of her face with minimal makeup on. Angela used a smoothening filter, ensuring she looked her best. Angela also kept her long blonde hair untied, allowing her hairdo to compliment her glowing face and match the vibe of the filter.
Angela Loves Her Coffee
Angela has talked about her diet and supplements over the last few months. Lately, she has taken to her Instagram to promote a coffee supplement that's helped her stay healthy and achieve her new toned look. In January 2024, Angela posted a video of herself sipping on a hot cup of coffee. She wore a cute pink top and big pink earrings; Angela captioned her post, "healthy is what this queen doing 2024," letting fans know that her physical transformation isn't just the result of surgery. Instead, Angela's been putting effort into all aspects of her life.
